Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: the feedback from my teacher somehow left me clueless, as it usually was unspecific. Thus, it did not really change my learning approach. With GenAI, I got clear instructions on what I could change, helping me to focus on these aspects.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
GenAI: always gives positive and negative feedback, so I felt like I was on the right track
Teacher: usually focus on negative feedback, I felt insecure afterwards.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: It is easier to get feedback from GenAI, because you can receive it immediately.
